short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message Tracker organizes the emails you send from your Gmail™ within ConnectSports.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track email opens and link clicks, keep your ConnectSports profiles’ activity feed and messages tab organized, and send emails from your Gmail™ .

Combine transparency of real-time message tracking, coordination that keeps you and your coaches on the same page, and deliverability to college coaches.

Message Tracker is free. A ConnectSports profile is required for this extension.

Get recruited to the right school with ConnectSports.

Have questions? Learn more at https://www.connectsports.co/message_tracker

Gmail is a trademark of Google Inc.
Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
